page.title: 08Tourism _ Leck area
page.content: In this area there are many holiday cottages, pubs, and bed and breakfast places.People come here for their holidays to see the wildlife and to walk up the fells.Some people come here because of the close proximity of the lakes where you can do water skiing,boating and swimming. We are also close to the Yorkshire Dales which are good for potholing,caving and walking. We are close to Morecambe which is a typical seaside resort with beaches,amusement arcades,bingo, illuminations etc.Lancaster, another nearby town, has great historical interest.It has a castle and a museum. The museum has Roman remains because Lancaster was a Roman City. The castle is on a hill which in those days would be very useful if it was attacked by savages or another race.It was also an important port.
